title: Unemployment Duration
description:
Description
Journal of Business Economics and Statistics web site : https://amstat.tandfonline.com/loi/ubes20
number of observations :  3343
reference: McCall, B.P. (1996) “Unemployment Insurance Rules, Joblessness, and Part-time Work”, Econometrica, 64, 647–682.

parameters.logwage: log weekly earnings in lost job (1985$)
parameters.spell: length of spell in number of two-week intervals
parameters.censor3: 1 if re-employed but left job: pt-ft status unknown
